alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 11:14AM MST until December 23 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 55 below zero. * WHERE...Dawson and Wibaux Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow will lead to very low visibility at times. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
